data.title: Anna Rice Obituary
data.text:
Anna Mae Rice

Born: May 20, 1923

Passed: October 12, 2015

Funeral Home: Armes Hunt Funeral Home

Anna Mae Rice, age 92, of Marion, Indiana, died Monday, October 12, 2015, at home surrounded by her family. Anna was born May 20, 1923 to the late Brown and Fannie (Wilson) Minter in Ricetown, Kentucky. She married Jimmie Rice on June 28, 1946. He survives. Anna attended Grace Community Church. She was also a member of the Arbor Trace Ladies Golf Club and the Elks Ladies League. Anna was the cafeteria supervisor for Allen Elementary School until she retired in 1986. Anna loved to play golf. She played for 38 years. She had 4 hole-in-ones; three were at Arbor Trace and one was in Florida. She also enjoyed bowling, crocheting, quilting, playing cards, and Yahtzee. Anna also loved to cook. She always wanted to make sure you ate. In addition to her husband, Jimmie, Anna is also survived by three daughters; Donna Enyeart, Marion, Indiana, Nancy (John) Chin, Marion, Indiana, and Patsy (Steve) Smithley, Marion, Indiana; sister; Lucy Rose DeBord, Booneville, Kentucky; brother; Tommie (Geraldine) Minter, Booneville, Kentucky; six grandchildren; Jennifer (Scott) DeBoy, Lisa (Kevin) Rittenhouse, Aaron Enyeart, Kyle (Andi) Chin, Todd (Diana Cole) Chin, and Parker (Careena) Smithley; 1...[more]

View Full Online Obituary and Tributes

reat-grandchildren and 2 great-great grandchildren. Anna was preceded in death by her son, Gary Paul Rice, son-in-law, Bobby Enyeart, sisters Ella Faye Gibson and Virginia Ruth Blackburn, and brother John Wilson Minter. The family would like to give a special thanks to the nurses at Heart to Heart Hospice for all of the care they gave to Anna and the family. Arrangements are being handled by College Park Chapel, Armes-Hunt Funeral Home and Cremation Services, 4601 S. Western Ave., Marion, Indiana. There will be a funeral service on Friday, October 16, at 1:30 pm at the funeral home, with Dr. Tom Mansbarger officiating. Burial will be at the I.O.O.F. cemetery in LaFontaine, Indiana. The family will receive friends on Thursday, October 15, from 4:00-8:00 pm. Contributions in memory of Anna may be made to Honor Flight of Northeast Indiana, PO Box 5, Huntertown, Indiana 46748. Memories and condolences may be made online at armeshuntfuneralhome.com.
